nodes.text: Star Wars: Rogue One: Secret Mission
Star Wars: Rogue One: Secret Mission is a 96-page Level 4 DK Readers title written by Jason Fry. It was released on December 16, 2016, alongside the Star Wars Anthology film Rogue One.
DK Reader L4: Star Wars Rogue One™ combines DK's four-level reading scheme with the exciting box office record-breaking Star Wars movies. DK Readers help kids learn to love reading.
